name: aqua
content:
aqua noun [U]
(COLOUR)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a greenish-blue colour: His jet is painted in aqua and features a picture of a dolphin on the tail.
George/Moment/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesVibrant colors like aqua brighten brown eyes.The earrings come in black, pink, aqua or white.metal serving trays (13") in canary, plum, palm, orange, orchid, fuchsia or aqua

aqua noun [U]
(WATER)
chemistry
  UK specialized water, when it is used in make-up and beauty products: Shampoo, shaving foam, and toothpaste all contain aqua (water), laureth sodium sulfate, and a whole list of other near-identical ingredients.
